definition: to cover/to encase/cover/sheath/to overlap/to interleave/to model after/to copy/formula/harness/loop of rope/(fig.) to fish for/to obtain slyly/classifier for sets, collections/bend (of a river or mountain range, in place names)/tau (Greek letter Ττ)
to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate

sentences.english: Conclusion Air enema is the best methods in treat and diagnose infant intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 結論空氣灌腸是診斷與治療小兒腸套疊的最好方法。

sentences.english: Objective To approach ultrasonic diagnosis and treatment of children's intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討小兒腸套疊的超聲診斷及治療。

sentences.english: Chronic intussusception is defined as intussusception lasting for 14 days or more.
sentences.chinese: 慢性腸套疉是指腸套疊持續存在超過14天。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the characteristics of secondary intussusceptions on ultrasonography.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討繼發性腸套疊的聲像圖特點。

sentences.english: Small bowel intussusception may require resection.
sentences.chinese: 小腸腸套疊需做腸切除術。

sentences.english: Researchers continued to study the link between vaccination and intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 於是，研究人員繼續探究疫苗接種與腸套疊的關係。

sentences.english: Upon opening the cecum, the invaginated appendix was recognized.
sentences.chinese: 打開盲腸即發現套疊的闌尾。

sentences.english: Methods A total of 302 cases with infant intussusception underwent high frequency ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 方法對302例嬰幼兒腸套疊患兒進行高頻超聲檢查。

sentences.english: All cases were performed an operation of resection of necrotic intestine after reduction of intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 全組均行套疊復位加壞死腸段切除一期吻合術。

sentences.english: Objective To analyse different influential factors that treat pediatric intussusception with air enema.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析空氣灌腸治療小兒腸套疊的各種影響因素。

sentences.english: Small bowel intussusception may require resection .
sentences.chinese: 小腸腸套疊需做腸切除術。

sentences.english: Objective To study the feature and value of Color doppler flow imaging(CDFI) in childrens intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討彩色多普勒超聲對小兒腸套疊的診斷價值。

sentences.english: He had clinical and X-ray evidences of intussusception which were relieved by a barium enema.
sentences.chinese: 經鋇灌腸術X光攝影證明腸套疊並復原之一例。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of anisodamine in the air reduction for child intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討山莨菪鹼在小兒腸套疊空氣整復中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the pathogenesis, diagnosis and therapy of adult intussusception.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討腸套疊的發病機制及診斷和治療方法。
